main event: A civilian reported seeing a stationary, disc-shaped object hovering in Ramsey, New Jersey for approximately 3 hours and 30 minutes in February 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and shiny or dull white in color,The witness claimed to have seen beams of light coming from the object,The object was out of sight behind some trees and then a mountain,The sighting lasted for a substantial duration of over three hours,The report includes sketches depicting the object's position relative to the horizon.
